price: Disse: "Apenas, Allah vo-lo fará vir se quiser, e não podereis escapar de Seu castigo.
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَأۡتِيكُم بِهِ ٱللَّهُ إِن شَآءَ وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: qāla innamā yatīkum bihi al-lahu in shāa wamā antum bimuʿ'jizīna
